comments: She is really nice and sweet but do not take her you won\'t learn anything it\'s hard to teach your self when you have no idea what\'s going on!!!!!! She\'s an awesome metic and very knowledgeable but I don\'t think she knows how to teach the material again if you can\'t study 25/7 and know how to teach your self then DONT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!
I would trust her to take care of my children. She is very experienced in the field, and has very good and inforational stories.

Great teacher, would not trade her for anyother teacher. She uses her phone to communicate with other students etc. If you are in a class like this you should be able to teach yourself. Read your book and learn something, it is not her job to baby you. Great teacher, great person.

She is a very nice Professor. She never has bad days and she does not bring her attitude to the classroom. On the other hand, she assigns a ton of homework and wordlists that can be used on the tests. The only problem with that is she does not give you the answers to check your work. Overall on a scale of 1-10, I would give her a 7.

wow.i can list a million things wrong with her class and how she does not teach they are right about her phone going off but did yall get the pleasure about her talking about her dad and dog all the gd time well this class did i wanted to shoot myself.she never used the book and yes the comment earlier about teaching yourself is true.DO NOT TAK HER

She is very useless and doesn\'t teach. Be prepared to learn on your own, even if asked for help from student she still kinda gets outta helping... she keeps her phone on during class and well litaraly sit there in the middle of a powerpoint lecture in which she just reads word for word and pause to text somebody back who text her or pick up the pho

She doesn\'t know the "Why" to any question, she assigns outrageous amounts of busywork, her lectures consist of reading verbatim from a PowerPoint, and she assigns PreTests (read: Study Guide) to which she doesn\'t provide any answers or reviews. Class is generally easy but if you can\'t teach yourself very well find another teacher fast!

She gives few homework but she gives you a chance to turn it in late without a deduction. her test is not hard u can study for 2hours the night before test and come out of that class with a B+ she gives lots of extra credit... shes funny... Most take her for EMT- Basic
